blogs.title: 10 Ways To Improve Your Next.js App Performance
blogs.desc: With this article, I will share some practices you can use to improve your app performance and architecture. Next.js makes it easier for developers to create and build a web application in very few steps.

blogs.title: Server-Side Session in Next.js v13 App Router
blogs.desc: Let's assume this scenario: you created a Next.js app using the new App router, and you need to store sensitive user session data like access token, refresh token, or maybe just form data that you want to access.
